title: Hiraku Nakajima elected President of the International Mathematical Union | Kavli IPMU-カブリ数物連携宇宙研究機構
snippet: Nakajima has served on several IMU-related committees since 2006. He will take over as IMU President from 2023 and serve for four years. About Hiraku Nakajima Hiraku Nakajima received his PhD in Science from the University of Tokyo in 1991.

title: Hiraku Nakajima
snippet: Although I send emails to ask help as the President of the IMU, they are sent from a special email address which has mathunion.org after @. They are also digitally signed.

title: Hiraku Nakajima (Kavli IPMU) elected President of the International Mathematical Union | The University of Tokyo
snippet: Nakajima has served on several IMU-related committees since 2006. He will take over as IMU President from 2023 and serve for four years. About Hiraku Nakajima Hiraku Nakajima received his PhD in Science from the University of Tokyo in 1991.

title: Hiraku Nakajima - Wikipedia
snippet: Hiraku Nakajima (Japanese: 中島 啓 Nakajima Hiraku; born November 30, 1962) is a Japanese mathematician, and a professor of the Kavli Institute for the Physics and Mathematics of the Universe at the University of Tokyo. He is International Mathematical Union president for the 2023–2026 term.

title: ICMI EC 2021-2024 | International Commission on Mathematical Instruction
snippet: Immediate Past President of ICMI- Jill Adler, South Africa IMU President- Hiraku Nakajima Japan (2023-2024) IMU Secretary General- Christoph Sorger, France (2023-2024)
